issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

comments.body: Patch for trunk. Update patch for trunk-2 after running Jenkins.
Thanks [~jiangjianfei] for catching this. +1 pending Jenkins.

Committed to trunk, branch-3.1 and branch-2.

Thanks [~jiangjianfei] for the contrition and thanks [~xyao] for the review.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #13841 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/13841/])
